Class InterestCalculator

java.lang.Object
InterestCalculator
public class InterestCalculator extends Object

Interest Calculator Class Level Javadoc

The purpose of Interest Class is to generate Simple interest, Compound interest and Average
Since:
2022-05-05
Version:
1.0
Author:

    • CalculateSimpleInterest

      public void CalculateSimpleInterest()
      calculates simple interest
      Parameters:
      S_principal - is the principal amount
      S_time - is the time period
      S_rateinterest - is the rate of interest

    • CalculateCompoundInterest

      public void CalculateCompoundInterest()
      calculates compound interest
      Parameters:
      C_principal - is the principal amount
      C_time - is the time period
      C_rateinterest - is the rate of interest
      C_number - is the number of times interest is compounded per time period

      public void FindAvg()
